body:
- added shas for v8.1.2/8.2.0
- added build-options for tk/tkinter (not sure whether all are necessary for vtk@8.2:)
- removed the general conflict for osmesa with qt – offscreen-rendering works starting with at least 8.1 (building 8.2.0 with qt5 worked fine, though the examples I found on vtk-wiki had some visual issues (probably related to deprecated API-calls/Wayland)
- added options necessary for building 8.2.0 (which needs some more libraries)
- fixed some libharu-bugs
- added hdf+hl [see: https://github.com/spack/spack/issues/11166]
title: vtk + tkinter (bumped to 8.2.0)
